q: ' What's the comeback for you?" Donald Rumsfeld 's tone remains even. The only faint sign of agitation as he replies is the furling, unfurling and scrunching of a napkin with his left hand. Well, I mean, there are plenty of people commenting on that about Afghanistan or Iraq or transformation, anything you do... That's quite a different thing than what I'm talking about.
